data.event: The area is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Southeast Slovenia Statistical Region.

event.title: 1574, Polom had only one and a half full-sized farms, divided

data.event: According to the land registry of 1574, Polom had only one and a half full-sized farms, divided into two three-eighths-farms and three quarter-farms, corresponding to between 40 and 45 residents.

event.title: was established in the village in 1858

data.event: A part-time school was established in the village in 1858, and a regular school in 1859.

event.title: became a founding unit of the Kočevje municipal fire department on 28 August 1955

data.event: The Polom volunteer fire department became a founding unit of the Kočevje municipal fire department on 28 August 1955.
